title: Foldylock & CLOSCA Loop Folding Helmet get Priority Limited Edition 174HUDSON colors
content:
New York-based Priority Bicycles has rolled out a special edition, high-visibility color option to its collection of commuter-centered accessories from other brands to complement their line of belt-driven bicycles. The CLOSCA Loop collapsable helmet, along with the Foldylock folding bike lock, are now available in the high-visibility 174Hudson color, named after the address of Priorityâ€™s

The post Foldylock & CLOSCA Loop Folding Helmet get Priority Limited Edition 174HUDSON colors appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Mark Wilson
